overview: After six months in the army, Jonah Reeves is gonna have some very full balls, and  he won't be able to drain them all by himself, so he has his buddies Johnny Rapid and then Jax Thirio help him. Jax is always looking for hot new guys for him and his army buddies to pass around, and he  checks out Jesse Avalon and Dacotah
title: Off Duty
